In this vignette, we demonstrate how to use a new R package **rcd** for implementing the robust copula
dependence (RCD). RCD is a dependence measure which
is designed for detecting nonlinear relationship among the data. The main function `rcd` in
the **rcd** is used to estimate the RCD between two random variables.

## Code Example

```{r,eval=FALSE}
require(rcd)
n <- 1000
x <- runif(n)
y <- x + 0.5*runif(n)
res.kde <- rcd(x, y, method = "kde")
```
